EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Toolkit Provider Application submitter requesting more information.
EmailTemplate.name: Toolkit Application Requires More Information
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit: Please Provide Additional Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name};
Thank you for submitting an application to participate in the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit. Unfortunately we do not have sufficient information to adjudicate your application. To provide further information to adjudicate your application, please complete the following steps in the next 15 days:
1. Log in to your Assistance Dashboard (https://www.export.gov/dashboard). 2. Click on the link to your Toolkit application. 3. Click "Comments" to see what additional information may be required. 4. Provide your response in the “Comments” box to send the communication to our team.
After 15 business days, a lack of response will be interpreted as an indication that you no longer wish to participate in the {!Case.RecordType} program and your application will be canceled.
If you have questions or concerns, please click here to submit an inquiry via the Assistance Dashboard and a member of our team will follow-up with you as soon as possible.
Thank you.
The {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit Team
